products.title: Mississippi Taped Dove Grey Real Wood
products.description: Their beautiful wooden mississippi range, consists of several striking shades. Compliment you home with natural wood oak shades, go for cool white and cream neutrals or go for something extra special with grey shades. With complimentary components, the range will breath a new look into your home. products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability. Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom.

products.title: Vista Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.description: The barely-there hue of the vista in magnolia will update your home using the latest utilitarian trend, where sturdy metals and retro dcor are everywhere. The magnolia has all the freshness of its light shade, with none of the daintiness, using a durable, heavy gauge aluminium to form its narrow, adjustable slats, which are perforated to let the light softly filter through. Place the magnolia in your kitchen, where it is functional and wipe-clean, and group with mocha browns and brushed silvers.

products.title: Decor Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pale canvas of the decor in cream features lightly stitched crescent shapes, gently intertwined to form a curious and attractive pattern. The fabric is lightweight yet hardy, ideal for a room and window that get plenty of footfall and use. Lay the cream against matching cream walls in a large, one-colour living room. The walls and blind, paired with similarly toned sofas, wall art, and rugs, will work together to create an airy surrounding, giving the impression of space and light.

products.title: Ecostyle Grained Oak Faux Wood
products.description: Ecostyle fauxwood is an elegant range of blinds that come in several colour variations. This golden brown faux wood blind will add the classic look to your space. Faux oak is mid golden brown hue, perfect to pair with conpemporary neutrals within the home. Made from pvc, it's easy to clean and keep fresh. Their reccomended choice for moisture prone spaces, for example bathrooms. Product id: sdb-wsb0609 fabric colour: faux oak grained material: upvc headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 50mm slat material: grained finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes ecostyle grained oak faux wood in brown/medium woods.
